info.title: Transfer Process Protocol - Rainbow Provider API
info.description: Transfer Process Protocol - Rainbow Provider API

get.summary: Retrieves all transfer processes in provider

200.description: Retrieves all transfer processes in provider

4XX.description: Error by retrieving all transfer processes in provider

5XX.description: Error by retrieving all transfer processes in provider

parameters.name: transfer_id
parameters.description: The ID of the transfer to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieves transfer processes in provider by id
get.description: Retrieves transfer processes in provider by id

200.description: Retrieves transfer processes in provider by id

404.description: Error not transfer process to be found

5XX.description: Error by retrieving all transfer processes in provider

get.summary: Retrieves transfer messages in provider by id
get.description: Retrieves transfer messages in provider by id

200.description: Retrieves transfer messages in provider by id

404.description: Error not transfer process to be found

5XX.description: Error by retrieving all transfer processes in provider

get.summary: Retrieves transfer message by provider and message id
get.description: Retrieves transfer message by provider and message id

200.description: Retrieves transfer message by provider and message id

404.description: Error not transfer process to be found or message

5XX.description: Error by retrieving all transfer processes in provider

post.summary: Creates a transfer start message and sends it to consumer, if works, establishes data plane and persist process and messages
post.description: Creates a transfer start message and sends it to consumer, if works, establishes data plane and persist process and messages

201.description: Consumer returns TransferProcess message and start process is persisted

503.description: Peer service is not available or throws error

post.summary: Creates a transfer suspension message and sends it to consumer, if works, establishes data plane and persist process and messages
post.description: Creates a transfer suspension message and sends it to consumer, if works, establishes data plane and persist process and messages

201.description: Consumer returns TransferProcess message and suspension process is persisted

503.description: Peer service is not available or throws error

post.summary: Creates a transfer completion message and sends it to consumer, if works, establishes data plane and persist process and messages
post.description: Creates a transfer completion message and sends it to consumer, if works, establishes data plane and persist process and messages

201.description: Consumer returns TransferProcess message and completion process is persisted

503.description: Peer service is not available or throws error

post.summary: Creates a transfer termination message and sends it to consumer, if works, establishes data plane and persist process and messages
post.description: Creates a transfer termination message and sends it to consumer, if works, establishes data plane and persist process and messages

201.description: Consumer returns TransferProcess message and termination process is persisted

503.description: Peer service is not available or throws error

post.summary: Create a new subscription to receive notifications
post.description: Create a new subscription to receive notifications

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: The ID of the subscription to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieves all notifications belonging to a subscription
get.description: Retrieves all notifications belonging to a subscription

200.description: Retrieves all notifications belonging to a subscription

get.summary: Retrieves all pending notifications belonging to a subscription
get.description: Retrieves all pending notifications belonging to a subscription

200.description: Retrieves all pending notifications belonging to a subscription

get.summary: Retrieves a notification by id and subscription
get.description: Retrieves a notification by id and subscription

200.description: Retrieves a notification by id and subscription

transfer_id.name: transfer_id
transfer_id.description: The ID of the transfer to retrieve

message_id.name: message_id
message_id.description: The ID of the message to retrieve

provider_pid.description: urn:uuid scheme with unique provider pid identifier

consumer_pid.description: urn:uuid scheme with unique consumer pid identifier

agreement_pid.description: urn:uuid scheme with unique agreement id identifier

data_plane_pid.description: urn:uuid scheme with unique data plane id identifier

id.description: urn:uuid scheme with unique provider pid identifier

transfer_process_id.description: urn:uuid scheme with unique consumer pid identifier

message.example: Error from deserializing path. Identifiers must have urn:uuid:<uuid> schema

DSRPCTransferProviderStartRequest.description: Request to start a transfer provider process

DSRPCTransferProviderStartResponse.description: Response to start a transfer provider process

DSRPCTransferProviderSuspensionRequest.description: Request to suspend a transfer provider process

DSRPCTransferProviderSuspensionResponse.description: Response to suspend a transfer provider process

DSRPCTransferProviderCompletionRequest.description: Request to complete a transfer provider process

DSRPCTransferProviderCompletionResponse.description: Response after completing transfer provider process

DSRPCTransferProviderErrorResponse.description: Error response for transfer provider process

DSRPCTransferProviderTerminationRequest.description: Request to suspend a transfer provider process

DSRPCTransferProviderTerminationResponse.description: Response to suspend a transfer provider process

RainbowEventsNotificationResponse.description: Response to create a notification and notifications to further systems
